profile.rationale: The job ad focuses exclusively on tasks related to training and evaluating generative AI models (Macro-Category B), specifically involving crafting questions and evaluating AI-generated code. There are no tasks related to traditional software engineering (Macro-Category A). While it mentions 'experienced software engineer', the core responsibilities are specialized AI tasks, leading to the 'GenAI Specialist' profile.
